label: REPORT ON CONFERENCE TO "Y” GROUPS TOMORROW

resource.chars:
REPORT ON CONFERENCE
TO "Y” GROUPS TOMORROW

Members of the Y. M. G. A. and
Y. W. C. A. will meet in the Au-
ditorium tomorrow afternoon at
4.10 to hear reports of the Evan-
ston Conference held during the.
Christmas holidays.

Over 3,000 students assembled at
Northwestern University to discuss
the relationship of students to the
churches. Every denomination was
represented and most all church
boards were there as “on-lookers.”
Only students, however, were allow-
ed to participate in the discussions.
Two definite decisions were made
by the group of students. First,
that they were opposed to all de-
nominations and creeds; second,
that they were opposed to denom-
inational colleges or schools. They
favored absolute freedom of thought
in an ideal unification of all
churches.
